def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper from Benner.Tecnologia.Common.BennerVariables import BennerVarsFactory
BennerVarsFactory().CreateSessionVars().SetSessionVar("GN_PESSOAS.FORNECEDOR.FORM", str(widget.Entity.Handle))
widget.View.Commands["DELETE"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("EXCLUIRFORNECEDOR") widget.View.Commands["EDIT"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTERFORNECEDOR") widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTERFORNECEDOR")
if (widget.View.Commands["CMD_DOCUMENTOSHABILITACAO"] != None): widget.View.Commands["CMD_DOCUMENTOSHABILITACAO"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoDocumentosHabilitacao
if (widget.View.Commands["CMD_Liberar"] != None): widget.View.Commands["CMD_Liberar"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoLiberar
if (widget.View.Commands["CMD_Confirmar"] != None): widget.View.Commands["CMD_Confirmar"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoConfirmar
if (widget.View.Commands["CMD_Recusar"] != None): widget.View.Commands["CMD_Recusar"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoRecusar
if (widget.View.Commands["CMD_Voltar"] != None): widget.View.Commands["CMD_Voltar"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoVoltarCadastro
if widget.Entity == None: return widget.View.Commands["CMD_CONSULTARCNPJ"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoConsultarCnpj
